name: pearl
short_effect: Sell for 700 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 1400 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A pretty pearl.
Can be sold cheaply.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A pretty pearl
that would sell at a
cheap price.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A relatively small pearl that
sparkles in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.
